title: About
text:
Education

PhD | 2020

TU Dortmund University, Dortmund, Germany
Dissertation: Modeling energy supply unit of ultra-low power devices with indoor photovoltaic harvesting
Supervisors: Prof. Michael ten Hompel, Prof. Luca Benini

MSc | 2011

Automation and Robotics, TU Dortmund University, Dortmund, Germany
Thesis topic: Optimization of the shuttle robots management in a SABIC high rise warehouse
Supervisors: Prof. Michael ten Hompel, Ekkehard Hornung, Dr. Sascha Feldhorst

BSc | 2007

Electrical Engineering, Khaje Nasir Toosi University of Technology (KNTU), Tehran, Iran
Thesis topic: Design and implementation of Brain Emotional Learning Based Intelligent Controller (BELBIC) for a level pilot plant
Supervisors: Dr. AliReza Fatehi, Prof. Caro Lucas




Researcher positions

Scientific researcher | 2019-2020

TU Dortmund University, ML2R - The Competence Center Machine Learning Rhine-Ruhr

Research associate | 2012-2018

TU Dortmund University, Chair of materials handling and warehousing (FLW)

Guest researcher | Nov.-Dec. 2016 and Nov.-Dec. 2017

Institute of Integrated Systems (IIS), ETH Zurich,




Fields of interest

Machine learning and AI
Cyber-Physical systems
Energy harvesting
Photovoltaic energy
Computer vision and image processing

title: Mojtaba Masoudinejad
text:
Wellcome
Thank you for visiting my personal webpage.
I am Mojtaba Masoudinejad (Farsi: مجتبی مسعودی نژاد); a researcher originally from Dezfool/Dezful in southwest Iran, living in Germany. Currently I am working as a senior Machine Learning Engineer for Bosch Center for Artificial Intelligence at Robert Bosch GmbH.
